title: How to Make Stuffed Lasagna Rolls

steps.headline: Boil and cook the lasagna sheets as directed.
Cut the lasagna sheets in half so they are about six inches (15cm) long.
Spread tomato paste onto one half of the half of the lasagna piece.
Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the tomato paste, in handfuls.
Use grated Parmesan cheese (cheese packets that come with pizza that you buy work well) to sprinkle on top of the mountain of cheese created in the previous step.
Spread beaten eggs onto edges of the lasagna strips.
Roll up each sheet to make a cylinder.
Add a yummy herb (dried ground basil or oregano are good choices) to the extra beaten eggs and spread across the tops of the stuffed lasagna rolls.
Sprinkle extra grated Parmesan cheese on top of the lasagna rolls.
Bake until the cheese has melted and the tomato paste is cooked.

text: Boil and cook the lasagna sheets as directed.  Cut the lasagna sheets in half so they are about six inches (15cm) long.  Spread tomato paste onto one half of the half of the lasagna piece.  Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the tomato paste, in handfuls.  Use grated Parmesan cheese (cheese packets that come with pizza that you buy work well) to sprinkle on top of the mountain of cheese created in the previous step.  Spread beaten eggs onto edges of the lasagna strips.  Roll up each sheet to make a cylinder.  Add a yummy herb (dried ground basil or oregano are good choices) to the extra beaten eggs and spread across the tops of the stuffed lasagna rolls.  Sprinkle extra grated Parmesan cheese on top of the lasagna rolls.  Bake until the cheese has melted and the tomato paste is cooked.  Finished.
